meanings.definition: A drug used to prevent or reduce the occurrence of seizures.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antiepileptics to control the seizures.
meanings.sent2: She takes antiepileptics daily to manage her epilepsy.
meanings.sent3: The antiepileptics danced around, keeping the seizures at bay.
meanings.sent4: His backpack was like a shield of antiepileptics against the seizures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pills of antiepileptics were her daily saviors.

meanings.definition: Relating to the treatment or prevention of epilepsy.
meanings.sent1: The hospital had a specialized unit for antiepileptics treatments.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on developing new antiepileptics therapies.
meanings.sent3: The antiepileptics conference was informative and engaging.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to antiepileptics care was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The antiepileptics approach showed promising results in the study.
